p: A full suite of portable, battery-powered equipment and laboratory consumables was put together based on the ARTIC network’s published kit list. Reagents that required cold chain transportation were carried in polystyrene temperature control boxes packed with ice packs frozen at -20 or -80°C prior to use. This equipment, including reagent boxes, could be packed into standard airline sized checked luggage (lab-in-a-suitcase) for transportation ( Figure 1).
